summary.span: 此类表示要开始生成必须指定的所有设置。

span.span: This class represents all of the settings which must be specified to start a build.

summary.span: 获取不可变的环境属性集合。

span.span: Gets an immutable collection of environment properties.

value.span: 返回不可变的环境属性集合。

span.span: Returns an immutable collection of environment properties.

remarks.span: 这不同于 BuildProcessEnvironment，因为存在一些添加的特定于 MSBuild 的属性，而这些环境变量在删除时将无效。

span.span: This differs from the BuildProcessEnvironment in that there are certain MSBuild-specific properties which are added, and those environment variables which would not be valid as MSBuild properties are removed.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义

span.span: Enables or disables legacy threading semantics

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义。如果启用，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics; true if enabled, false otherwise.

remarks.span: 旧式线程处理语义表明，如果仅在进程内节点上生成提交，并以同步方式执行提交，则会在调用生成的线程（而不是 BuildManager 拥有的线程）上生成其所有请求。

span.span: Legacy threading semantics indicate that if a submission is to be built only on the in-proc node and the submission is executed synchronously, then all of its requests will be built on the thread which invoked the build rather than a thread owned by the BuildManager.

summary.span: 一个标志，用于指示是否在项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境（如当前目录和环境）。

span.span: Flag indicating if the operating environment such as the current directory and environment be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations.

summary.span: 对于在系统中运行的任何其他生成管理器，应将此值设置为 false，这样我们就不会有两个生成管理器相互干扰对方的环境。

span.span: This should be set to false for any other build managers running in the system so that we do not have two build managers trampling on each others environment.

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关指定是否应在各个项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境。如果应保存环境，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch indicating whether the operating environment should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations; true if the environment should be saved, false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在系统中运行的任何其他生成管理器，应将此值设置为 false，这样就不会在每个其他环境上 trampling 两个生成管理器。This should be set to false for any other build managers running in the system so that we do not have two build managers trampling on each others environment.

summary.span: 在生成完成后关闭进程内节点。

span.span: Shutdown the inprocess node when the build finishes.

summary.span: 默认情况下，此值为 false，因为 Visual Studio 需要在生成完成后保留进程内节点。

span.span: By default this is false since visual studio needs to keep the inprocess node around after the build finishes.

value.span: 返回标志。

span.span: Returns the flag.

member this.UseSynchronousLogging : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 默认情况下，如果进程数设置为 1，则将使用异步日志记录。

span.span: By default if the number of processes is set to 1 we will use Asynchronous logging.

summary.span: 但是，如果我们希望在 CPU 的数量设置为 1 时使用同步日志记录，则需要将该属性设置为 true。

span.span: However if we want to use synchronous logging when the number of cpu's is set to 1 this property needs to be set to true.

value.span: 返回一个开关，该开关指定在只有单个进程时是否使用同步日志记录。如果使用同步日志记录，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: Returns a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process; if true, use synchronous logging, otherwise use asynchronous logging.
